text: Joseph Raymond "Toots" Mondt (January 18, 1894 â€” June 11, 1976) was an American professional wrestler. He co-promoted the World Wide Wrestling Federation (now known as WWE) along with "Grand" McMahon. ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1976 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling promoters Category:WWE Hall of Fame
